site_name: Grounds Of Regan Lodge And 123-131 Pennington Drive And 111-119 Pennington Drive N21 1TP
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Works to various trees within The Highlands Conservation Area- G10 - Front of 1-5 Regan Lodge - x1 Yew & x1 Pear - Reduce crowns by upto 1.5m, pruning to suitable growth points/branch fork junctions. Lift crowns over footpath to give 3m ground clearance. G11 - Side of 8-9 Regan Lodge - x2 Hornbeam & x1 Hawthorn. Reduce crowns by upto 1m, pruning to suitable growth points/branch fork junctions. Lift crowns to give 3m ground clearance .G12 - Front of 123-131 Pennington Drive - x2 Pear - Reduce crowns by upto 1m, pruning to suitable growth points/branch fork junctions. Lift crowns over footpath to ensure 3m ground clearance, targeting secondary growth where possible. T6 - Front of 111-119 Pennington Drive - x1 Pear - Reduce crown by upto 1.5m, pruning to suitable growth points/branch fork junctions. Lift crown to give around 3m ground clearance, targeting secondary growth where possible.
